properties.title: Welcome to the AJF Persistence Developer Website : Module Integration Tests

section.name: Welcome
section.p:
This module contain the integration tests of the Persistence CDI extension.
The tests are organized as follow :
ajf.persistence.jpa.test : Contain the base test class for each core concept of the persistence extension (@NamedQuery, @StoredProcedure, EntityManager provider, ...)
ajf.persistence.jpa.test.harness : Contain the class used by the tests to test one possible use of the framework. If you want to add a new use case, you will need to add a class in harness illustring your example, then you can add a unit test in the base package.
